content: by rodica iosif 2nd decrease k1 k2tog k28 30 32 34 ssk k1 knit 4 round as established in patt for instep and stockinette on the sole 3rd decrease k1 k2tog k26 28 30 32 ssk k1 now you should have the original number of st for your size half on the instep and half on the sole foot follow the chart for instep and knit in stockinette st on sole until foot is about 1 5 / 4cm less than the desired length toe decreases r 1 2 3 -- knit r 10 repeat r4 r 4 * k1 ssk k across instep till last 3 st r 11 knit k2tog k1 repeat from * for sole r 12 repeat r 4 r 5 6 7 - knit r 13 knit r 8 repeat r 4 r 14 and forward repeat r 4 until 16 st remain r 9 knit last r * k1 ssk ssk k2tog k1 repeat from * to end you should have 10 sts left cut yarn leaving 8-10 /20-25cm tail with your tapestry needle thread the tail through the remained live st twice and pull tight alternatively you can kitchener these last st weave in ends knit the second sock and enjoy chart written pattern r1 and r2 - *k3p1 repeat from * to end of row r3 and r4 k to end r5 - *k1p1 repeat from * to end of row r6 and r7 k to end i would be very happy to see your projects if you have questions please send me a pm on ravelry @ 4crinialbi please do not sell distribute copy etc this pattern without permission @4crinialbi 4
